questions.question: How do you design for least privilege?
questions.opening: Access should match tasks, not roles.

questions.question: Explain the shared responsibility model
questions.opening: Security responsibilities are split between the provider and the customer.
questions.closing: Most security gaps come from misunderstanding ownership.

questions.question: What is blast radius and why does it matter?
questions.opening: Blast radius describes how much damage a single failure can cause.

questions.question: What security controls must exist on day one?
questions.opening: Certain controls must be present before any workloads launch.

questions.question: What are common cloud security mistakes?
questions.opening: Most failures start with identity and visibility gaps.

questions.question: How do you approach cloud security architecture?
questions.opening: I start with identity and guardrails, not infrastructure.
